[date of source: 2001
Finding aid encoded by Valerie Higgins, Library/Archives, Indiana University, September 24, 2008

did.head: Summary Information
did.unittitle: Boxer mss. III,
did.langmaterial: Materials are mostly in English. Also includes materials in German, French, Dutch, and Portuguese
did.abstract: The Boxer mss. III, 1928-1999, consist of the correspondence, papers and memorabilia of historian Charles R. Boxer, 1904-2000.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Historian and professor of history at University of London, Yale University, and Indiana University.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is organized into the following series: I. Correspondence; II. Writings by Boxer; III. Writings by others; IV. Miscellaneous; V. Printed.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: The Boxer mss. III, 1928-1999, consist of the correspondence, papers and memorabilia of historian Charles R. Boxer, 1904-2000. The correspondence primarily concerns Boxer's academic research and career. The writings contain: drafts of his books, speeches, and articles, including an extensive file of his book reviews; notes, about 80 notebooks and research materials; drafts of articles and books by other writers. Also present are his personal calendars, photographs (mostly of his travels), and certificates and medals for such awards as Grand Cross of the "Ordem do Infante Dom Henrique" and the Grand Cross of the "Ordem Militar de Sant'Iago da Espada," both from the Portuguese government.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in IUCAT, the IU Libraries' online catalog. Materials about related topics, persons or places can be found by searching the catalog using these terms.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Boxer mss.; also located at the Lilly Library, Indiana University, Bloomington, Indiana.
Boxer mss. II; also located at the Lilly Library, Indiana University, Bloomington, Indiana.

userestrict.head: Usage Restrictions
userestrict.p: Prior arrangements are not necessary before coming to the Library; however, patrons from out of town are encouraged to communicate with the Library in advance of their visits to ascertain availability of materials.
Photocopying permitted only with permission of the Curator of Manuscripts, Lilly Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item], Boxer mss. III, Lilly Library, Indiana University, Bloomington, Indiana.

did.unittitle: Correspondence

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content:
scopecontent.p: Arranged alphabetically by correspondent. Individual names with significant number of letters may have separate folders and are filed immediately after the folder in which they would have been included. Year or range of years of the correspondence follows each name.
